mean_cn: adj. 官僚的，官僚政治的
mean_en: using or connected with many complicated rules and ways of doing things :of, relating to, or like a bureaucracy or bureaucrat
word_etyma: bureau政府机构+cra统治+tic…的  → 官僚政治的，官僚主义的
sentence: Why do I have to go through these bureaucratic processes just to buy a house?
sentence_trans: 为什么我要经过那么多官僚程序才能买一套房子啊？
